namespace = steppe
namespace = Horde_Collapse
namespace = flavor_chu
namespace = horde_events
namespace = flavor_ggk
namespace = horde_mechanic_events
namespace = timur
namespace = moghul
country_event = { 
	id = steppe.1
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = ASSASSINATION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = EVT_AI
		steppes_group = { 
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger1
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger2
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger3
		}
		arabian_steppes_group = { 
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger1
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger2
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger3
		}
		saharan_steppes_group = { 
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger1
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger2
			add_province_triggered_modifier = steppe_trigger3
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.1
	title = "Horde_Collapse.1.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.1.d"
	picture = ASSASSINATION_eventPicture
	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.1.a"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					tag = CHG
				}
			}
			kill_ruler = yes
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				tag = WHI
				exists = KHI
			}
			KHI = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = timur.36
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = CHU
				CHU = { 
					junior_union_with = ROOT
				}
			}
			break_union = CHU
			CHU = { 
				free_vassal = ARM
				free_vassal = SYU
				define_ruler = { 
					culture = mongolic_turk
					ADM = 1
					DIP = 1
					MIL = 1
					claim = 30
					fixed = yes
				}
				kill_heir = yes
			}
		}
		every_subject_country = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_subject = no
							is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
							is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
							is_subject_of_type = muscovite_tributary_state
						}
					}
				}
			}
			grant_independence = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = Horde_DisasterCD
				duration = 8000
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = Horde_PuppetCD
				duration = 3650
			}
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
			set_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
			add_horde_unity = -35
			add_prestige = -20
			define_heir = { 
				dynasty = ROOT
				culture = turco_mongol
				age = 20
				ADM = 1
				DIP = 1
				MIL = 1
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
				}
				add_local_autonomy = 5
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							culture = owner
						}
					}
					add_nationalism = 15
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					ai = yes
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							stability = 3
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 1200
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = 1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = 1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = 5
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
		hidden_effect = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								is_city = yes
								is_colony = yes
							}
							has_province_flag = Data
						}
						check_variable = { 
							which = atc
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = -10
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atg
						value = -10
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-10
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = owner
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = -10
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atg
						value = -10
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-10
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = ahf
				value = -600
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 1200
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						stability = 3
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 1200
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 1200
					}
					add_stability = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							stability = -2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 1200
					}
					add_stability = -1
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = ahd
				which = ahf
			}
			divide_variable = { 
				which = ahd
				value = 12
			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = ahd
				value = 0.1
			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = ahd
				value = 10
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = lsc
				value = 100
			}
			subtract_variable = { 
				which = lsc
				which = ahd
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract50
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = -2.5
		}
		random_list = { 
			30 = { }
			50 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = -600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -2.5
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = -1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.2
	title = "Horde_Collapse.2.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.2.d"
	picture = ASSASSINATION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_heir = yes
		heir_age = 15
		OR = { 
			AND = { 
				NOT = { 
					horde_unity = 30
				}
				heir_claim = 75
			}
			AND = { 
				NOT = { 
					horde_unity = 50
				}
				heir_claim = 50
			}
			AND = { 
				NOT = { 
					horde_unity = 75
				}
				heir_claim = 25
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = puppet_khanate
		}
		has_regency = no
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
		is_at_war = no
	}
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.2.a"
		kill_heir = yes
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_horde_unity = -25
		}
		add_prestige = -10
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					check_variable = { 
						which = atc
						value = 0.001
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = -5
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = -5
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100.001
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-5
		random_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
				development = 7
			}
			spawn_rebels = { 
				type = pretender_rebels
				culture = turco_mongol
				size = 3
			}
		}
		random_list = { 
			30 = { }
			50 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = -600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -2.5
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = -1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.3
	title = "Horde_Collapse.3.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.3.d"
	picture = CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_country_modifier = genghis_khanate
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Puppet_Rule
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = Horde_PuppetCD
		}
		is_year = 1365
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.3.a"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				tag = WHI
				NOT = { 
					is_year = 1385
				}
			}
			define_ruler = { 
				name = "Mamai"
				dynasty = "Kiyat"
				culture = turco_mongol
				ADM = 3
				DIP = 2
				MIL = 5
				fixed = yes
			}
		}
		else = { 
			define_ruler = { 
				culture = turco_mongol
				ADM = 3
				DIP = 2
				MIL = 5
				fixed = yes
			}
		}
		define_ruler_to_general = { 
			fire = 4
			shock = 3
			manuever = 3
			siege = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			remove_country_modifier = genghis_khanate
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = puppet_khanate
				duration = -1
			}
			kill_heir = yes
			add_horde_unity = 50
		}
		add_prestige = 10
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					stability = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 1200
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = 1
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = 1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = 5
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					check_variable = { 
						which = atc
						value = 0.001
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = 20
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = 20
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100.001
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_20
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Horde_Puppet_Rule
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.4
	title = "Horde_Collapse.4.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.4.d"
	picture = CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			has_regency = yes
			NOT = { 
				horde_unity = 60
			}
		}
		has_country_modifier = genghis_khanate
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
			}
			NOT = { 
				horde_unity = 30
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Puppet_Rule
			}
			NOT = { 
				horde_unity = 40
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.4.a"
		define_ruler = { 
			dynasty = ROOT
			culture = turco_mongol
			ADM = 1
			DIP = 2
			MIL = 2
			fixed = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_horde_unity = -50
			kill_heir = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					check_variable = { 
						which = atc
						value = 0.001
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = -10
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = -10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100.001
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-10
		random_list = { 
			30 = { }
			50 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = -600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						which = ahd
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_StabSubtract50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -2.5
				}
			}
			20 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_stability = -1
					}
				}
				tooltip = { 
					add_stability = -1
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}
					add_mandate = -5
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ach
					value = -5
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_WelfareProv_-5
		random_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
				development = 7
			}
			spawn_rebels = { 
				type = pretender_rebels
				culture = turco_mongol
				size = 3
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.5
	title = "Horde_Collapse.5.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.5.d"
	picture = GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_modifier = Horde_DisasterCD
			}
			has_country_flag = Horde_Puppet_Rule
			has_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
			is_subject_of = TIM
		}
		has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.5.a"
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		capital_scope = { 
			add_local_autonomy = -50
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					check_variable = { 
						which = atc
						value = 0.001
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = 10
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = 10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100.001
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_10
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					stability = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 1200
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = 1
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = 1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = 5
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.6
	title = "Horde_Collapse.6.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.6.d"
	picture = GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.6.a"
		add_horde_unity = 10
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					check_variable = { 
						which = atc
						value = 0.001
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = 20
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = 20
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100.001
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_20
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					stability = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 1200
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = 3
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = 3
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = 15
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				clr_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
			}
			capital_scope = { 
				add_local_autonomy = -50
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Puppet_Rule
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
			set_country_flag = Horde_Unifier
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = Horde_Collapse.7
	title = "Horde_Collapse.7.t"
	desc = "Horde_Collapse.7.d"
	picture = GOOD_WITH_MONARCH_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = "Horde_Collapse.7.a"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					}
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = Horde_Collapse.6
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_disaster_progress = { 
				disaster = Horde_Collapse
				value = 100
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

			}

						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update

				type = pretender_rebels

				size = 3
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				change_variable = { 
					which = ach
					value = -5
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_WelfareProv_-5
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_country_flag = Horde_Great_Rule
			set_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = horde_events.20
	title = horde_events.20.t
	desc = horde_events.20.d
	picture = KING_SICK_IN_BED_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = WHI
		has_ruler = "Jani Beg"
		NOT = { 
			is_year = 1360
		}
		has_any_disaster = no
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 1
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.OHNO"
		kill_ruler = yes
		add_horde_unity = -50
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
			define_heir = { 
				name = "Qulpa"
				dynasty = ROOT
				culture = turco_mongol
				age = 18
				ADM = 1
				DIP = 1
				MIL = 1
			}
			add_horde_unity = -5
			add_prestige = -10
		}
		random_list = { 
			30 = { }
			50 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = -600
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								stability = 3
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
						}
						else = { 
							subtract_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ahf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									stability = -2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ahf
								value = 1200
							}
							add_stability = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						which = ahf
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 0.1
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ahd
						value = 10
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = lsc
						value = 100
					}

						which = ahd
					}

				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes
					}

				}
			}
			20 = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								stability = -2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ahf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = {

					}

				}

					limit = { 
						is_emperor_of_china = yes

					add_mandate = -5

country_event = { 
	id = horde_events.100
	title = horde_events.100.t
	desc = horde_events.100.d
	picture = HORDE_ON_HORSEBACK_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
		AND = { 
			OR = { 
				AND = { 
					government = tribal
					check_variable = { 
						which = grs
						value = 1
					}
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = grt
						value = 0
					}
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = hqx
						value = 3
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
						tooltip = is_monarchy_tt
						OR = { 
							government = monarchy
							government = has_harem
						}
					}
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = gro
						value = 8
					}
				}
			}
		}
		personal_union = 1
		any_subject_country = { 
			AND = { 
				num_of_cities = 1
				NOT = { 
					tag = AAA
				}
			}
			junior_union_with = ROOT
			AND = { 
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						government = tribal
						check_variable = { 
							which = grs
							value = 1
						}
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = grt
							value = 0
						}
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = hqx
							value = 3
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
							tooltip = is_monarchy_tt
							OR = { 
								government = monarchy
								government = has_harem
							}
						}
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gro
							value = 8
						}
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
			}
			NOT = { 
				years_in_union_under = { 
					who = ROOT
					years = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = horde_events.100.a
		every_subject_country = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					num_of_cities = 1
					NOT = { 
						tag = AAA
					}
				}
				junior_union_with = ROOT
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							government = tribal
							check_variable = { 
								which = grs
								value = 1
							}
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = grt
								value = 0
							}
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = hqx
								value = 3
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
								tooltip = is_monarchy_tt
								OR = { 
									government = monarchy
									government = has_harem
								}
							}
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = gro
								value = 8
							}
						}
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					years_in_union_under = { 
						who = ROOT
						years = 5
					}
				}
			}
			break_union = ROOT
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			CHU = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							num_of_cities = 1
							NOT = { 
								tag = AAA
							}
						}

						}
					}
					country_event = { 
						id = flavor_chu.4
					}
					clr_country_flag = under_WHI_PU
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 90
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				OR = { 
					tag = JAI
					tag = MUZ
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = horde_events.100.b
		custom_tooltip = horde_PU_war
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_subject_country = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
					junior_union_with = ROOT
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								government = tribal
								check_variable = { 
									which = grs
									value = 1
								}
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = grt
									value = 0
								}
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = hqx
									value = 3
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
									tooltip = is_monarchy_tt
									OR = { 
										government = monarchy
										government = has_harem
									}
								}
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = gro

								}
							}
						}
					}

							years = 5

				break_union = ROOT
				ROOT = { 
					declare_war_with_cb = {

						casus_belli = cb_nomadic_submission
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0

					has_disaster = Horde_Collapse
				}
			}

				factor = 0
				tag = MGH
				is_year = 1365
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { 
	id = horde_events.22
	title = horde_events.22.t
	desc = horde_events.22.d
	picture = BORDER_TENSION_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		is_at_war = yes
		is_nomad = yes
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = steppe_declined_tributary
		}
		is_in_war = { 
			war_score = 25
			attacker_leader = ROOT
			casus_belli = cb_tribal_raid
		}
		any_known_country = { 
			is_in_war = { 
				defender_leader = THIS
				casus_belli = cb_tribal_raid
			}
			NOT = { 
				is_nomad = yes
				tag = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 2
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.8
			is_in_war = { 
				war_score = 30
				attacker_leader = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_tribal_raid
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.8
			is_in_war = { 
				war_score = 40
				attacker_leader = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_tribal_raid
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.8
			is_in_war = { 
				war_score = 50
				attacker_leader = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_tribal_raid
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "horde_events.22.a"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 5
		}
		every_country = { 
			limit = { 
				is_in_war = { 
					attacker_leader = ROOT
					defender_leader = THIS
					casus_belli = cb_tribal_raid
				}
				NOT = { 
					tag = ROOT
				}
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = horde_events.23
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "horde_events.22.b"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
		add_war_exhaustion = 1
		add_prestige = 10
	}
}

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_chu.1
	title = flavor_chu.1.t
	desc = flavor_chu.1.d
	picture = PALAIS_MAZARIN_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		senior_union_with = CHU
	}
	option = { 
		name = EVT_AI
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				CHU = { 
					is_at_war = yes
				}
			}
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
					offensive_war_with = CHU
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = flavor_chu.2
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				CHU = { 
					is_at_war = no
				}
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = flavor_chu.3
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = flavor_chu.2
	title = flavor_chu.2.t
	desc = flavor_chu.2.d
	picture = BATTLE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = peace_with_CHU
		}
		offensive_war_with = CHU
		CHU = { 
			AND = { 
				is_subject = yes
				NOT = { 
					is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
				}
				NOT = { 
					is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
				}
				NOT = { 
					is_subject_of_type = muscovite_tributary_state
				}
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			tag = JAI
			tag = MUZ
			tag = WHI
			tag = ISF
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = flavor_chu.2.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 25
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				OR = { 
					tag = ERE
					tag = JAI
					tag = WHI
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					tag = MUZ
					tag = ISF
				}
			}
			2225 = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owned_by = CHU
					}
					cede_province = ROOT
					add_core = ROOT
					add_claim = FROM
				}
			}
			1313 = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owned_by = CHU
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							controlled_by = ROOT
						}
						cede_province = ROOT
						add_core = ROOT
						add_core = FROM
						3079 = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									owned_by = CHU
								}
								cede_province = ROOT
								add_core = ROOT
								add_core = FROM
							}
						}
					}
					else = { 
						cede_province = SDB
						add_claim = SDB
						add_core = FROM
					}
				}
			}
		}
		white_peace = CHU
		CHU = { 
			overlord = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = flavor_chu.3
				}
			}
		}
		white_peace = FROM
	}
	option = { 
		name = flavor_chu.2.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 75
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				OR = { 
					tag = MUZ
					tag = ISF
				}
			}
		}
	}
	after = { 
		set_country_flag = peace_with_CHU
	}
}

	option = { 
		name = flavor_chu.3.a
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				tag = JAI
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					owned_by = CHU
				}
				add_claim = MUZ
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						exists = ISF
					}
					add_claim = ISF
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				tag = MUZ
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					owned_by = CHU
				}
				add_claim = JAI
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						exists = ISF
					}
					add_claim = ISF
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				tag = ISF
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					owned_by = CHU
				}
				add_claim = JAI
				add_claim = MUZ
			}
		}
		inherit = CHU
		hidden_effect = { 
			3079 = { 
				add_core = ISF
			}
			2225 = { 
				add_core = ISF
			}
			2227 = { 
				add_core = TEH
			}
			1313 = { 
				add_core = TEH
			}
			3078 = { 
				add_core = TEH
			}
			412 = { 
				add_core = TEH
			}
			1314 = { 
				add_core = TEH
			}
			416 = { 
				add_core = TAB
			}
			463 = { 
				add_core = TAB
			}
			1321 = { 
				add_core = TAB
			}
			1318 = { 
				add_core = TAB
			}
			416 = { 
				add_core = TAB
			}
			2219 = { 
				add_core = QAR
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					is_core = CHU
				}
				remove_core = CHU
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = flavor_chu.4
	title = flavor_chu.4.t
	desc = flavor_chu.4.d
	picture = CONQUEST_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = { 
		name = OPT.BASTARD
		define_ruler = { 
			name = "Akhi"
			dynasty = "Juq"
			ADM = 1
			DIP = 1
			MIL = 3
			fixed = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					overlord_of = ARM
				}
				ARM = { 
					add_liberty_desire = 200
					grant_independence = yes
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					overlord_of = SYU
				}
				SYU = { 
					add_liberty_desire = 200
					grant_independence = yes
				}
			}
			JAI = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = flavor_chu.5
					days = 10
				}
			}
			MUZ = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = flavor_chu.5
					days = 10
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					exists = ISF
					ISF = { 
						is_at_war = no
					}
				}
				ISF = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = flavor_chu.5
						days = 10
					}
				}
			}
			kill_heir = yes
			define_ruler_to_general = { 
				fire = 2
				shock = 2
				manuever = 2
				siege = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.21
	title = "flavor_ggk.21.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.21.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = 1530_start_date
		}
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = CRI
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			region = crimea_region
			check_variable = { 
				which = abb
				value = 10
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
		is_year = 1390
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 100
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM

				tag = RUS
			}
		}

			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_subject_of_type = personal_union
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = CRI
				}
			}
			CRI = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		crimea_region = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
			}
			add_core = CRI
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = crimean
			}
		}
		moldavia_area = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					culture = vlach
				}
				add_core = MOL
			}
		}
		basarabia_area = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
				}
				add_claim = MOL
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
		}
		crimea_region = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = PREV
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = CRI
			hidden_effect = { 
				CRI = { 
					export_to_variable = {

						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = {

								which = kdt

						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					force_converted = yes

			}
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}

				}
				OR = { 
					area = moldavia_area
					area = basarabia_area
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = MOL
			hidden_effect = {

					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = kdt
								value = -1
							}
						}

							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					force_converted = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				CRI = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = muscovite_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = CRI
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}
		CRI = { 
			declare_war_with_cb = { 
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_independence_war
			}
		}
		MOL = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = fe_MOL.1
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.VERYWELL"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
		crimea_region = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = PREV
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = CRI

					}

					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}

						duration = 1825
					}
				}

					limit = {

							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.31
	title = "flavor_ggk.31.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.31.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = 1530_start_date
		}
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = AST
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}

			value = 2

		}

			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing

				}
			}

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.41
	title = "flavor_ggk.41.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.41.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = 1530_start_date
		}
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = NOG
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			area = nogai_area
			check_variable = { 
				which = abb
				value = 10
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur

					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
		is_year = 1390
	}

						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					is_capital = no
				}
				cede_province = NOG
				hidden_effect = { 
					NOG = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
		}
	}
	after = { 
		NOG = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 3287
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_part_of_hre = yes
							ROOT = { 
								is_part_of_hre = no
							}
						}
						set_in_empire = no
						swap_non_generic_missions = yes
						emperor = { 
							add_opinion = { 
								who = ROOT
								modifier = hre_province_left
							}
						}
						add_imperial_influence = -1
					}
					set_capital = 3287
					hidden_effect = { 
						set_country_flag = tf_recalculate_communication_efficiency
						set_country_flag = ai_tax_recalc
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = blessing_of_god
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}
					}
					change_government = tribal
					add_government_reform = Pol_Identity3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Privileges1
					hidden_effect = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bba
								value = -2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.51
	title = "flavor_ggk.51.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.51.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		is_year = 1400
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = 1530_start_date
		}
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = KZH
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			region = kazakh_region
			check_variable = { 
				which = abb
				value = 10
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 100
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK
				tag = CHU
				is_nomad = no
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_subject_of_type = personal_union
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = KZH
				}
			}
			KZH = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		kazakh_region = { 
			add_core = KZH
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = khazak
			}
		}
		syrdarya_area = { 
			add_core = KZH
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = khazak
			}
		}
		arys_area = { 
			add_core = KZH
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = khazak
			}
		}
		477 = { 
			add_core = KZH
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = khazak
			}
		}
		5072 = { 
			change_culture = khazak
		}
		2223 = { 
			change_culture = khazak
		}
		3295 = { 
			change_culture = khazak
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
		}
		kazakh_region = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = PREV
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = KZH
			hidden_effect = { 
				KZH = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}

						which = kdt
						which = export
					}

						limit = {

								which = kdt
								value = -1
							}
						}

							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					force_converted = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				KZH = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = muscovite_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = KZH
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}

					}
				}

					who = ROOT
					casus_belli = cb_independence_war
				}
			}
		}
	}

								which = not
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = noy
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					country_event = { 
						id = Init.1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.61
	title = "flavor_ggk.61.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.61.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = 1530_start_date
		}
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = SHY
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			region = amodarya_region
			NOT = { 
				area = khiva_area
			}
			check_variable = { 
				which = abb
				value = 10
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			any_known_country = { 
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					num_of_cities = 1
					NOT = { 
						tag = AAA
					}
				}
			}
		}
		is_year = 1410
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 100
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK

			}

		}

			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}

			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}

				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9

				war_score = -40
			}
		}

				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = {

			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_subject_of_type = personal_union
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = SHY
				}
			}
			SHY = {

			}
		}

			limit = {

					area = khiva_area
				}

				}
				NOT = { 
					area = vaxsh_area
				}

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.71
	title = "flavor_ggk.71.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.71.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = 1530_start_date
		}
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = KHI
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 40

				stability = 0
			}
		}

			value = 2

				which = abb

		}

			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered

			war_with = TIM
		}

			war_with = GGK
		}

			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur

					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}

			any_known_country = { 
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur

						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead

		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_subject_of_type = personal_union
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = KHI
				}
			}
			KHI = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		khiva_area = { 
			add_core = KHI
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						culture = tartar
						culture = chaghatai
					}
				}
				change_culture = uzbehk
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
		}
		khiva_area = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					is_capital = no
				}
				cede_province = KHI
				hidden_effect = { 
					KHI = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				KHI = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = muscovite_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = KHI
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}
		KHI = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				declare_war_with_cb = { 
					who = ROOT
					casus_belli = cb_independence_war
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.VERYWELL"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
		}
		khiva_area = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = PREV
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					is_capital = no
				}
				cede_province = KHI
				hidden_effect = { 
					KHI = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
		}
	}
	after = { 
		KHI = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 442
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_part_of_hre = yes
							ROOT = { 
								is_part_of_hre = no
							}
						}
						set_in_empire = no
						swap_non_generic_missions = yes
						emperor = { 
							add_opinion = { 
								who = ROOT
								modifier = hre_province_left
							}
						}
						add_imperial_influence = -1
					}
					set_capital = 442
					hidden_effect = { 
						set_country_flag = tf_recalculate_communication_efficiency
						set_country_flag = ai_tax_recalc
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 3279
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_part_of_hre = yes
							ROOT = { 
								is_part_of_hre = no
							}
						}
						set_in_empire = no
						swap_non_generic_missions = yes
						emperor = { 
							add_opinion = { 
								who = ROOT
								modifier = hre_province_left
							}
						}
						add_imperial_influence = -1
					}
					set_capital = 3279
					hidden_effect = { 
						set_country_flag = tf_recalculate_communication_efficiency
						set_country_flag = ai_tax_recalc
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = blessing_of_god
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}
					}
					change_government = tribal
					add_government_reform = Pol_Identity3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Privileges1
					hidden_effect = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bba
								value = -2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbc
								value = -1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbe

							}

							}

							set_variable = { 
								which = bbi
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = {

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.81
	title = "flavor_ggk.81.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.81.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = 1530_start_date
		}
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = KAZ
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 30
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			culture = kazani
			check_variable = { 
				which = abb
				value = 10
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			AND = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
				}
			}
			is_year = 1400
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 100
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK
				tag = CHU
				is_nomad = no
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_subject_of_type = personal_union
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = KAZ
				}
			}
			KAZ = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		4016 = { 
			add_core = KAZ
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = kazani
			}
		}

			add_core = KAZ

					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = kazani
			}
		}

			add_core = KAZ
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = tartar
				}
				change_culture = kazani
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				tag = WHI
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
				culture = kazani
				is_capital = no

					}

					}
					force_converted = yes
				}
			}
		}

			limit = { 
				KAZ = { 
					is_subject = no
				}

					OR = { 
						is_subject = no

						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = auy
								value = 3
							}

							}

								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nop

							}
						}

							set_variable = { 
								which = noq
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nor
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = not

							}

						hidden_effect = {

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.91
	title = "flavor_ggk.91.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.91.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = 1530_start_date
		}
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = SIB
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 50
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 2
			OR = { 
				area = iskier_area
				area = yrtesh_area
			}
			check_variable = { 
				which = abb
				value = 10
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Collapse_Ongoing
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Ruler_Murdered
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 100
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK
				tag = CHU
				is_nomad = no
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_subject_of_type = personal_union
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = SIB
				}
			}
			SIB = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		west_siberia_region = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
				NOT = { 
					area = upper_ob_area
				}
			}
			add_core = SIB
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						culture = tartar
						culture = chaghatai
					}
				}
				change_culture = siberian
			}
		}
		kazakh_region = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					culture = siberian
				}
				add_core = SIB
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
		}
		west_siberia_region = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
				NOT = { 
					area = upper_ob_area
				}
				owned_by = PREV
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = SIB
			hidden_effect = { 
				SIB = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = kdt
								value = -1
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					force_converted = yes
				}
			}
		}
		4204 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_capital = no
				}
				cede_province = SIB
				hidden_effect = { 
					SIB = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}

								owner = {

								}
							}
						}

							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		kazakh_region = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
				culture = siberian
				owned_by = PREV
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = SIB
			hidden_effect = { 
				SIB = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = kdt
								value = -1
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					force_converted = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				SIB = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = muscovite_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = SIB
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}
		SIB = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				declare_war_with_cb = { 
					who = ROOT
					casus_belli = cb_independence_war
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.VERYWELL"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 70
		}
		west_siberia_region = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
				NOT = { 
					area = upper_ob_area
				}
				owned_by = PREV
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = SIB
			hidden_effect = { 
				SIB = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = kdt
								value = -1
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = {

							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					force_converted = yes
				}
			}
		}
		4204 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_capital = no
				}
				cede_province = SIB
				hidden_effect = { 
					SIB = { 
						export_to_variable = {

					}
					has_province_flag = Data

				culture = siberian
				owned_by = PREV

			hidden_effect = { 
				SIB = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = kdt
								value = -1
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					force_converted = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
		}
	}
	after = { 
		SIB = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				define_ruler = { 
					name = "Abu'l Khayr"
					dynasty = "Shaybanid"
					culture = siberian
					ADM = 3
					DIP = 4
					MIL = 5
					claim = 90
					fixed = yes
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 1079
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_part_of_hre = yes
							ROOT = { 
								is_part_of_hre = no
							}
						}
						set_in_empire = no
						swap_non_generic_missions = yes
						emperor = { 
							add_opinion = { 
								who = ROOT
								modifier = hre_province_left
							}
						}
						add_imperial_influence = -1
					}
					set_capital = 1079
					hidden_effect = { 
						set_country_flag = tf_recalculate_communication_efficiency
						set_country_flag = ai_tax_recalc
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 2446
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_part_of_hre = yes
							ROOT = { 
								is_part_of_hre = no
							}
						}
						set_in_empire = no
						swap_non_generic_missions = yes
						emperor = { 
							add_opinion = { 
								who = ROOT
								modifier = hre_province_left
							}
						}
						add_imperial_influence = -1
					}
					set_capital = 2446
					hidden_effect = { 
						set_country_flag = tf_recalculate_communication_efficiency
						set_country_flag = ai_tax_recalc
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = blessing_of_god
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}
					}
					change_government = tribal
					add_government_reform = Pol_Identity3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Privileges1
					hidden_effect = { 
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bba
								value = -2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbc
								value = -1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = bbe

							}

							}

						hidden_effect = {

								value = 1

country_event = { 
	id = flavor_ggk.101
	title = "flavor_ggk.101.t"
	desc = "flavor_ggk.101.d"
	picture = GENGIS_KHAN_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = 1530_start_date
		}
		OR = { 
			culture_group = altaic
			culture_group = tartar_group
			culture_group = old_turkic
		}
		NOT = { 
			tag = BSH
		}
		OR = { 
			is_bankrupt = yes
			AND = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				NOT = { 
					war_score = -20
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 40
			}
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		num_of_owned_provinces_with = { 
			value = 1
			culture = bashkir
			check_variable = { 
				which = abb
				value = 10
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = TIM
		}
		NOT = { 
			war_with = GGK
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 100
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			OR = { 
				tag = GOL
				tag = WHI
				tag = BLU
				tag = TIM
				tag = YUA
				tag = GGK
				tag = CHU
				is_nomad = no
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			has_any_disaster = yes
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			exists = RUS
			NOT = { 
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = 0
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -1
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			NOT = { 
				stability = -2
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -30
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -40
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			is_at_war = yes
			NOT = { 
				war_score = -50
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { 
				legitimacy_equivalent = 10
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 3
			is_subject_of_type = personal_union
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = BSH
				}
			}
			BSH = { 
				clr_country_flag = POP_Init
			}
		}
		2438 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = bashkir
				}
				add_core = BSH
			}
		}
		1082 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = bashkir
				}
				add_core = BSH
			}
		}
		1080 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					culture = bashkir
				}
				add_core = BSH
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.BASTARD"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				is_at_war = yes
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				NOT = { 
					is_nomad = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				tag = WHI
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
				culture = bashkir
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = BSH
			hidden_effect = { 
				BSH = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = kdt
								value = -1
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					force_converted = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				BSH = { 
					is_subject = no
				}
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
						is_subject_of_type = muscovite_tributary_state
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				who = BSH
				subject_type = custom_vassal
			}
		}
		BSH = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
				declare_war_with_cb = { 
					who = ROOT
					casus_belli = cb_independence_war
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.VERYWELL"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 70
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					OR = { 
						is_city = yes
						is_colony = yes
					}
					has_province_flag = Data
				}
				culture = bashkir
				is_capital = no
			}
			cede_province = BSH
			hidden_effect = { 
				BSH = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = kdt
								value = -1
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					force_converted = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_nomad = yes
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
		}
	}
	after = { 
		BSH = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 2438
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_part_of_hre = yes
							ROOT = { 
								is_part_of_hre = no
							}
						}
						set_in_empire = no
						swap_non_generic_missions = yes
						emperor = { 
							add_opinion = { 
								who = ROOT
								modifier = hre_province_left
							}
						}
						add_imperial_influence = -1
					}
					set_capital = 2438
					hidden_effect = { 
						set_country_flag = tf_recalculate_communication_efficiency
						set_country_flag = ai_tax_recalc
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						owns = 1082
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_part_of_hre = yes
							ROOT = { 
								is_part_of_hre = no

						}

						set_country_flag = tf_recalculate_communication_efficiency
						set_country_flag = ai_tax_recalc
					}

				if = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = blessing_of_god
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_country_flag = POP_Init
						}
					}
					change_government = tribal
					add_government_reform = Pol_Identity3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Leadership1
					add_government_reform = Pol_Tradition4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1

					hidden_effect = {
