									limit = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = -1
										}
									}

										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
								force_converted = yes

						}

						}

									which = kdt
									which = export
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = -1
										}
									}
									capital_scope = { 
										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
								force_converted = yes
							}
						}
					}
					SMO = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = Init.2
						}
					}

								export_to_variable = { 
									which = export
									value = religion
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									which = export
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = -1
										}
									}
									capital_scope = { 
										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
								force_converted = yes
							}
						}

							id = Init.2
						}
					}

	option = { 
		name = timur_release
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.10
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Armenia
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Anatolia
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Khorasan
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Balkh
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = MOL

				any_owned_province = {

				}

						is_core = WAL

								value = religion

								which = export
							}

								limit = {

										which = kdt
										value = -1
									}
								}
								capital_scope = { 
									owner = { 
										change_religion = PREV
									}
								}
							}

								which = kdt

								which = kdt
								which = export
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = kdt
										value = -1
									}
								}
								capital_scope = { 
									owner = { 
										change_religion = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
							force_converted = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}

				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = ROS
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = ROS
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = ROS
				}

				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = ROS

					ROS = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
			ROS = {

					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}

						region = fars_region
					}
					NOT = { 
						continent = asia
					}
				}
			}
			grant_independence = yes
		}
	}

country_event = { 
	id = timur.34
	title = timur.34.t
	desc = timur.34.d
	picture = BATTLE_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = KHI
		is_year = 1361
		exists = yes
		exists = CHG
		CHG = { 
			NOT = { 
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
					}
				}
			}
			has_disaster = Horde_Collapse
		}
		OR = { 
			442 = { 
				NOT = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
			}
			3278 = { 
				NOT = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
			}
			3279 = { 
				NOT = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
			}
			440 = { 
				NOT = { 
					owned_by = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 2
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.34.a"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 90
		}
		add_prestige = 50
		442 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						owned_by = PREV
					}
				}
				cede_province = PREV
				hidden_effect = { 
					PREV = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		3278 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						owned_by = PREV
					}
				}
				cede_province = PREV
			}
		}
		3279 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						owned_by = PREV
					}
				}
				cede_province = PREV
				hidden_effect = { 
					PREV = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		440 = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						owned_by = PREV
					}
				}
				cede_province = PREV
				hidden_effect = { 
					PREV = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_part_of_hre = yes
				ROOT = { 
					is_part_of_hre = no
				}
			}
			set_in_empire = no
			swap_non_generic_missions = yes
			emperor = { 
				add_opinion = { 
					who = ROOT
					modifier = hre_province_left
				}
			}
			add_imperial_influence = -1
		}
		set_capital = 442
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = tf_recalculate_communication_efficiency
			set_country_flag = ai_tax_recalc
		}
		CHG = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = timur.35
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.34.b"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
		}
		add_prestige = -25
	}
	after = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			white_peace = CHG
		}
	}
}

		tag = KHI
		exists = yes
		exists = BLU
		is_subject = no
		is_at_war = no
	}

		name = "timur.36.a"

			factor = 95
		}

			}

	}

	id = timur.37

	desc = timur.37.d
	picture = RELIGION_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		has_country_flag = Timur_Persianate
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Timur_Persianised
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_ruler_flag = Timur_Persianising
		}
		NOT = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
		}
		capital_scope = { 
			superregion = persia_superregion
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 48
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 3
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 2
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 1
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 90
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 80
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 70
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 60
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 50
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.37.a"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				has_country_flag = Timur_Persia
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					culture_group = persian_group
				}
			}

			change_primary_culture = tajihk
		}
		add_government_reform = Pol_NominalEmpire
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Timur_Persianised
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.37.b"
		add_horde_unity = 25
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 70
		}
	}
	after = { 
		set_ruler_flag = Timur_Persianising
	}
}

		}

		add_prestige = -50

				days = 5
			}
		}

			if = {

					owned_by = PREV
				}
				cede_province = FROM
				hidden_effect = { 
					FROM = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion

							which = kdt
							which = export
						}

									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt

						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}

								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		442 = {

					owned_by = PREV
				}
				cede_province = FROM

					FROM = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion

							which = kdt
							which = export

				cede_province = FROM

					FROM = {

							which = kdt

					overlord = { 
						ai = yes
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				white_peace = FROM
			}

			}
			FROM = { 
				create_subject = { 
					subject_type = tributary_state
					who = KHI
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { 
	id = timur.42
	title = timur.42.t
	desc = timur.42.d
	picture = SIEGE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			is_year = 1420
		}
		tag = ORM
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Timur_Surrender
		}
		any_known_country = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				num_of_cities = 1
				NOT = { 
					tag = AAA
				}
			}
			war_with = ROOT
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur.42.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 100
		}
		random_country = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
					}
				}
				has_country_flag = Timur_West
				AND = { 
					num_of_cities = 1
					NOT = { 
						tag = AAA
					}
				}
				war_with = ROOT
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = ROOT
					superregion = persia_superregion
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 431
					}
				}
				add_core = PREV
				cede_province = PREV
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur.42.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = { 
	id = timur.46
	title = timur.46.t
	desc = timur.46.d
	picture = CIVIL_WAR_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "timur.46.a"
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					stability = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 1200
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = 3
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = 3
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = 15
		}
		add_horde_unity = 50
		define_ruler = { 
			name = "Tokhtamysh"
			dynasty = "Jochid"
			ADM = 5
			DIP = 4
			MIL = 6
		}
		define_heir = { 
			name = "Jalal al-Din"
			dynasty = "Jochid"
			ADM = 4
			DIP = 4
			MIL = 3
		}
		define_ruler_to_general = { 
			fire = 4
			shock = 5
			manuever = 5
			siege = 1
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					check_variable = { 
						which = atc
						value = 0.001
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atf
					value = 50
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atg
					value = 50
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100.001
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_50
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = Timur_Mustering
				duration = 1820
				hidden = yes
			}
			set_country_flag = Tokhtamysh_Has
			add_manpower = 10
			add_army_tradition = 10
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = TIM
					exists = TIM
				}
				cede_province = TIM
				hidden_effect = { 
					TIM = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		create_alliance = TIM
		TIM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = timur.48
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
		create_subject = { 
			subject_type = decentralized_vassal
			who = WHI
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = Tokhtamysh_Has
				exists = TIM
			}
			TIM = { 
				create_subject = { 
					subject_type = tributary_state
					who = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.54.b"
		add_horde_unity = -5
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.55
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = BATTLE_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	trigger = { 
		is_year = 1368
		AND = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
			}
		}
		has_country_flag = Timur_East
		ai = yes
		is_at_war = no
		any_neighbor_country = { 
			AND = { 
				OR = { 
					culture_group = tartar_group
					culture_group = old_turkic
					culture_group = altaic
					culture_group = qiangic
					primary_culture = turkmeni
					primary_culture = sart
					primary_culture = tajihk
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				alliance_with = PREV
			}
			NOT = { 
				truce_with = PREV
			}
			NOT = { 
				guaranteed_by = PREV
			}
			NOT = { 
				overlord_of = PREV
			}
			OR = { 
				is_subject = no
				AND = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_subject = no
							is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
							is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
							is_subject_of_type = muscovite_tributary_state
						}
					}
					ai = yes
				}
				overlord = { 
					NOT = { 
						AND = { 
							has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
							NOT = { 
								has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			OR = { 
				NOT = { 
					tag = DLH
				}
				PREV = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = TIM_DLH
					}
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				num_of_cities = 1
				NOT = { 
					tag = AAA
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 18
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 3
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 2
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 1
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 90
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 80
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 70
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 60
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 50
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			prestige = 50
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = no_localisation
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = KHI
				OR = { 
					is_neighbor_of = KHI
					any_subject_country = { 
						is_neighbor_of = KHI
					}
				}
				KHI = { 
					NOT = { 
						alliance_with = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						truce_with = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						guaranteed_by = PREV
					}
					NOT = { 
						overlord_of = PREV
					}
					OR = { 
						is_subject = no

							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									is_subject = no
									is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
									is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
									is_subject_of_type = muscovite_tributary_state
								}
							}
							ai = yes
						}
						overlord = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
									NOT = { 
										has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						num_of_cities = 1
						NOT = { 
							tag = AAA
						}
					}
				}
			}
			KHI = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_subject = yes
						is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
					}
					grant_independence = yes
				}
			}
			declare_war_with_cb = {

country_event = { 
	id = timur.56
	title = timur.56.t
	desc = timur.56.d
	picture = SIEGE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			is_year = 1420
		}
		tag = MGH
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Timur_Surrender
		}
		is_at_war = yes
		TIM = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = Timur_West
			ai = yes
			war_with = MGH
			AND = { 
				num_of_cities = 1
				NOT = { 
					tag = AAA
				}
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			capital_scope = { 
				controlled_by = TIM
			}
			TIM = { 
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
					}
				}
				war_score_against = { 
					who = MGH
					value = 30
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur.56.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 100
		}
		TIM = { 
			white_peace = MGH
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			white_peace = TIM
		}
		every_province = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = MGH
				is_core = TIM
			}
			cede_province = TIM
			hidden_effect = { 
				TIM = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = kdt
								value = -1
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					force_converted = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur.56.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	after = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Timur_Surrender
			TIM = { 
				set_country_flag = TIM_MGH
			}
		}
	}
}

			has_country_flag = Tokhtamysh_Has
		}

			overlord_of = BLU
			alliance_with = BLU
		}

			province_id = 1310
			owned_by = WHI
		}
	}

		name = "timur.57.a"

				id = timur.54
			}
		}
	}
}

	hidden = yes

	trigger = { 
		tag = BLU
		has_country_flag = Tokhtamysh
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Tokhtamysh_Has
		}
		has_ruler_flag = Tokhtamysh_Repelled
		is_year = 1377
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 2
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.58.a"
		kill_ruler = yes
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.59
	title = timur.59.t

		name = timur_centralise

			limit = {

					NOT = { 
						exists = MNA

					}

				hidden_effect = { 
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							is_core = MNA
						}

						add_claim = PREV

						hidden_effect = { 
							MNA = { 
								export_to_variable = { 
									which = export
									value = religion
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									which = export
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = -1
										}
									}

										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0

							}
						}

							id = Init.2
						}
					}

													which = kdt

												}
											}

		name = timur_release
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.10
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100

					has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand

							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
			KHA = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}

							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
			MHX = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = MHX
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = MHX
					hidden_effect = { 
						MHX = { 
							export_to_variable = { 
								which = export
								value = religion
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								which = export
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = kdt
										value = -1
									}
								}
								capital_scope = { 
									owner = { 
										change_religion = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
							force_converted = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = SAK
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = SAK
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = SAK
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = SAK
				hidden_effect = { 
					SAK = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
			SAK = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = SAK
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = SAK
					hidden_effect = { 
						SAK = { 
							export_to_variable = { 
								which = export
								value = religion
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								which = export
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = kdt
										value = -1
									}
								}
								capital_scope = { 
									owner = { 
										change_religion = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
							force_converted = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = YEN
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = YEN
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = YEN
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = YEN
				hidden_effect = { 
					YEN = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
			YEN = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = YEN
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = YEN
					hidden_effect = { 
						YEN = { 
							export_to_variable = { 
								which = export
								value = religion
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								which = export
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = kdt
										value = -1
									}
								}
								capital_scope = { 
									owner = { 
										change_religion = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
							force_converted = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.60
	title = timur.60.t
	desc = timur.60.desc
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = timur_chinadynasty
		trigger = { 
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_China
				has_country_flag = Timur_Mongolia
				has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
				has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 100
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_China
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = barbarian_claimant_china
		add_prestige = 10
		north_china_superregion = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = ROOT
			}
			add_core = ROOT
		}
		east_china_superregion = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = ROOT
			}
			add_core = ROOT
		}
		southwest_china_superregion = { 
			limit = { 
				owned_by = ROOT
			}
			add_core = ROOT
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = KOR
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = KOR
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = KOR
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = KOR
					hidden_effect = { 
						KOR = { 
							export_to_variable = { 
								which = export
								value = religion

								which = kdt

							}

								limit = {

										which = kdt

								}

									owner = { 
										change_religion = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
							force_converted = yes
						}
					}
				}
				KOR = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = Init.2
					}
				}
			}
			create_subject = { 
				subject_type = close_tributary_state
				subject = KOR
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = {

						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nol
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nom
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = non
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = noo
								value = 0
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nop
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = noq
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = nor
								value = 2
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = not
								value = 1
							}
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = noy
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					add_government_reform = Pol_Succession5
					add_government_reform = Pol_Family4
					add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Structure5
					add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Autonomy2
					add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial3
					add_government_reform = Pol_Military4
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						exists = YUA
					}
					any_owned_province = { 
						is_core = YUA
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							is_core = YUA
						}
						remove_core = PREV
						add_claim = PREV
						cede_province = YUA
						hidden_effect = { 
							YUA = { 
								export_to_variable = { 
									which = export
									value = religion
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									which = export
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = -1
										}
									}
									capital_scope = { 
										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
								force_converted = yes
							}
						}
					}
					YUA = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = Init.2
						}
					}
				}
				create_subject = { 
					subject_type = warlord
					subject = YUA
				}
			}
			else = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							is_core = YUA
						}
						remove_core = PREV
						add_claim = PREV
						cede_province = YUA
						hidden_effect = { 
							YUA = { 
								export_to_variable = { 
									which = export
									value = religion
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									which = export
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = -1
										}
									}
									capital_scope = { 
										owner = { 
											change_religion = PREV
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
								force_converted = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					exists = KOR
				}
				any_owned_province = { 
					is_core = KOR
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					is_core = KOR
				}
				remove_core = PREV
				add_claim = PREV
				cede_province = KOR
				hidden_effect = { 
					KOR = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
			KOR = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = Init.2
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						is_core = KOR
					}
					remove_core = PREV
					add_claim = PREV
					cede_province = KOR
					hidden_effect = { 
						KOR = { 
							export_to_variable = { 
								which = export
								value = religion
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								which = export
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = kdt
										value = -1
									}
								}
								capital_scope = { 
									owner = { 
										change_religion = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
							force_converted = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur_chinarelease
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 100
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_China
					has_country_flag = Timur_Mongolia
					has_country_flag = Timur_Samarkand
					has_country_flag = Timur_Sarai
				}
			}
		}
		random_neighbor_country = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					culture_group = chinese_group
					has_country_flag = barbarian_claimant_china
				}
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						superregion = north_china_superregion
						superregion = east_china_superregion
						superregion = southwest_china_superregion
						region = tibet_region
					}
					owned_by = ROOT
				}
				add_core = PREV
				cede_province = PREV
				hidden_effect = { 
					PREV = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = religion
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							which = export
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = -1
								}
							}
							capital_scope = { 
								owner = { 
									change_religion = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						force_converted = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.61
	title = timur.61.t
	desc = timur.61.d
	picture = OVEREXTENSION_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		AND = { 
			has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
			}
		}
		tag = TIM
		AND = { 
			is_subject = yes
			NOT = { 
				is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
			}
			NOT = { 
				is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
			}
			NOT = { 
				is_subject_of_type = muscovite_tributary_state
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 1
	}
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Timur_Dead
			set_country_flag = Timur_Deposed
			add_government_reform = Horde_Monarchy
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "timur.61.a"
		define_ruler = { 
			name = "Shah Rukh"
			dynasty = "Timurid"
			culture = turco_mongol
			religion = sunni
			age = 25
			male = yes
			adm = 4
			dip = 3
			mil = 5
			fixed = yes
			claim = 95
		}
		define_ruler_to_general = { 
			fire = 2
			shock = 4
			manuever = 3
			siege = 1
		}
		clear_scripted_personalities = yes
		add_ruler_personality = scholar_personality
		add_ruler_personality = architectural_visionary_personality
		add_ruler_personality = benevolent_personality
		define_consort = { 
			name = "Goharshad"
			age = 35
			dynasty = "Tarkhan"
			culture = persian
			adm = 4
			dip = 5
			mil = 3
		}
		add_ruler_modifier = { 
			name = shahrukhs_empire
		}
		country_event = { 
			id = timur.22
			days = 90
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = hus
					value = 15
				}
			}
			add_horde_unity = -10
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								is_city = yes
								is_colony = yes
							}
							has_province_flag = Data
						}
						check_variable = { 
							which = atc
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atf
						value = -15
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atg
						value = -15
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = atf
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = atf
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = atf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_TRLoyProv_-15
			add_prestige = -20
			hidden_effect = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							stability = -2
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ahf
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					add_stability = -5
				}
			}
			tooltip = { 
				add_stability = -5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor_of_china = yes
				}
				add_mandate = -25
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = puppet_khanate
				duration = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							NOT = { 
								province_group = steppes_group
							}
							AND = { 
								NOT = { 
									continent = central_asia
								}
								NOT = { 
									region = crimea_region
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = sistan_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = iran_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = fars_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = khorasani_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = hindusthan_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = punjab_region
						}

						}

				}

				limit = {

				}
				grant_independence = yes
			}

						culture_group = persian_group

				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					leader = "Miran Shah Timurid"
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 4
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data

					OR = { 
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					leader = "Khalil Timurid"
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 4
				}
			}

						}
						NOT = { 
							region = south_caucasus_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = north_anatolia_region
						}
						NOT = { 
							region = south_anatolia_region
						}
					}
					add_nationalism = 20
				}
			}
			every_subject_country = { 
				limit = { 
					is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
				}
				grant_independence = yes
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					leader = "Sultan Husayn Tayichiud"
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = mongolic_turk
					size = 8
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					leader = "Miran Shah Timurid"
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 8
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					leader = "Khalil Timurid"
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 8
				}
			}
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
					OR = { 
						culture_group = tartar_group
						culture_group = persian_group
						culture_group = altaic
						culture_group = ROOT
					}
					development = 7
				}
				spawn_rebels = { 
					leader = "Pir Muhammad Timurid"
					type = pretender_rebels
					culture = turco_mongol
					size = 8
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.62
	title = timur.62.t
	desc = timur.62.d
	picture = SIEGE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			is_year = 1420
		}
		tag = DLH
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Timur_Surrender
		}
		is_at_war = yes
		TIM = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
			ai = yes
			war_with = DLH
			AND = { 
				num_of_cities = 1
				NOT = { 
					tag = AAA
				}
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			capital_scope = { 
				controlled_by = TIM
			}
			DLH = { 
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
					}
				}
				war_score_against = { 
					who = DLH
					value = 50
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur.62.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 100
		}
		TIM = { 
			white_peace = DLH
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			white_peace = TIM
		}
		TIM = { 
			create_subject = { 
				subject_type = muscovite_tributary_state
				who = PREV
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur.62.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	after = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Timur_Surrender
			TIM = { 
				set_country_flag = TIM_DLH
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = timur.63
	title = timur.63.t
	desc = timur.63.d
	picture = SIEGE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			is_year = 1420
		}
		tag = MAM
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Timur_Surrender
		}
		is_at_war = yes
		TIM = { 
			AND = { 
				has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
				}
			}
			ai = yes
			war_with = MAM
			AND = { 
				num_of_cities = 1
				NOT = { 
					tag = AAA
				}
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			capital_scope = { 
				controlled_by = TIM
			}
			377 = { 
				controlled_by = TIM
			}
			MAM = { 
				AND = { 
					has_country_flag = Horde_Timur
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = Timur_Dead
					}
				}
				war_score_against = { 
					who = MAM
					value = 30
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur.63.a
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 100
		}
		TIM = { 
			white_peace = MAM
		}
		MAM = { 
			every_subject_country = { 
				TIM = { 
					white_peace = PREV
				}
			}
		}
		TIM = { 
			white_peace = SYR
		}
		TIM = { 
			white_peace = DUL
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			white_peace = TIM
		}
		every_province = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					OR = { 
						is_subject_of = MAM
						tag = MAM
					}
				}
				OR = { 
					region = north_anatolia_region
					region = south_anatolia_region
					region = upper_mesopotamia_region
					region = lower_mesopotamia_region
					area = aleppo_area
				}
				NOT = { 
					province_id = 2750
				}
				NOT = { 
					province_id = 321
				}
			}
			add_core = TIM
			cede_province = TIM
			hidden_effect = { 
				TIM = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = religion
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						which = export
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = kdt
								value = -1
							}
						}
						capital_scope = { 
							owner = { 
								change_religion = PREV
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					force_converted = yes
				}
			}
		}
		TIM = { 
			create_subject = { 
				subject_type = muscovite_tributary_state
				who = PREV
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = timur.63.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	after = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Timur_Surrender
			TIM = { 
				set_country_flag = TIM_MAM
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = moghul.1

	desc = moghul.1.d
	picture = SIEGE_eventPicture

		is_year = 1389
		NOT = { 
			is_year = 1420
		}
		tag = MGH
		religion_group = muslim
		OR = { 
			overlord_of = KAS
			KAS = { 
				is_subject = no
			}
		}
		KAS = { 
			NOT = { 
				religion_group = muslim
			}
			NOT = { 
				religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 6
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 3
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 2
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			stability = 1
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 90
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 80
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 70
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 60
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			legitimacy_equivalent = 50
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			prestige = 50
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = moghul.1.a
		KAS = { 
			grant_independence = yes
		}
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = CL_ReligiousWar_L
			duration = 3650
		}
		declare_war_with_cb = { 
			who = KAS
			casus_belli = cb_crusade
		}

			add_core = MGH
		}
		KAS = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = moghul.2
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.9
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = moghul.1.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = moghul.2
	title = moghul.2.t
	desc = moghul.2.d
	picture = SIEGE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = { 
		name = moghul.2.a
		trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		add_legitimacy = 25
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					stability = 3
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 1200
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = 1
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = 1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = 5
		}
		add_army_tradition = 10
	}
	option = { 
		name = moghul.2.b
		trigger = { 
			ai = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						stability = -2
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 0
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = -1
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = -1
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = -5
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = moghul.3
	title = moghul.3.t
	desc = moghul.3.d
	picture = SIEGE_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = KAS
		war_with = MGH
		MGH = { 
			religion_group = muslim
		}
		owns = 3213
		NOT = { 
			controls = 3213
		}
		NOT = { 
			is_year = 1420
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = moghul.3.a
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				4705 = { 
					culture = old_uyghur
				}
			}
			4705 = { 
				change_culture = chaghatai
				change_religion = sunni
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owner = { 
							ai = no
						}
						4705 = { 
							any_neighbor_province = { 
								owned_by = MGH
							}
						}
					}
					4705 = { 
						cede_province = MGH
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						province_event = { 
							id = Prov_UI.502
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				2118 = { 
					culture = old_uyghur
				}
			}
			2118 = { 
				change_culture = chaghatai
				change_religion = sunni
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owner = { 
							ai = no
						}
						2118 = { 
							any_neighbor_province = { 
								owned_by = MGH
							}
						}
					}
					2118 = { 
						cede_province = MGH
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						province_event = { 
							id = Prov_UI.502
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				717 = { 
					culture = old_uyghur
				}
			}
			717 = { 
				change_culture = chaghatai
				change_religion = sunni
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owner = { 
							ai = no
						}
						717 = { 
							any_neighbor_province = { 
								owned_by = MGH
							}
						}
					}
					717 = { 
						cede_province = MGH
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						province_event = { 
							id = Prov_UI.502
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				4958 = { 
					OR = { 
						culture = old_uyghur
						owned_by = KAS
					}
				}
			}
			4958 = { 
				change_culture = oirats
				change_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						owner = { 
							ai = no
						}
						4958 = { 
							any_neighbor_province = { 
								owned_by = OIR
							}
						}
					}
					4958 = { 
						cede_province = OIR
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						province_event = { 
							id = Prov_UI.502
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				ai = no
			}
			2743 = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						culture = old_uyghur
					}
					change_culture = chaghatai
				}
			}
			3213 = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						culture = old_uyghur
					}
					change_culture = chaghatai
				}
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					owned_by = KAS
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								area = hami_area
							}
							NOT = { 
								area = zungaria_area
							}
						}
						province_id = 3213
					}
				}
				cede_province = MGH
				hidden_effect = { 
					province_event = { 
						id = Prov_UI.502
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					exists = OIR
				}
				every_province = { 
					limit = { 
						owned_by = KAS
						OR = { 
							province_id = 2742
							province_id = 4958
						}
					}
					cede_province = OIR
					hidden_effect = { 
						province_event = { 
							id = Prov_UI.502
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					exists = YUA
				}
				every_province = { 
					limit = { 
						owned_by = KAS
					}
					cede_province = YUA
					hidden_effect = { 
						province_event = { 
							id = Prov_UI.502
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				every_province = { 
					limit = { 
						owned_by = KAS
					}
					add_core = HMI
					cede_province = HMI
					hidden_effect = { 
						province_event = { 
							id = Prov_UI.502
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = moghul.4
	title = moghul.4.t
	desc = moghul.4.d
	picture = SIEGE_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		is_year = 1370
		NOT = { 
			is_year = 1389
		}
		tag = MGH
		religion_group = muslim
		OR = { 
			overlord_of = KAS
			KAS = { 
				is_subject = no
			}
		}
		KAS = { 
			NOT = { 
				religion_group = muslim
			}
			NOT = { 
				religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 1
	}
	option = { 
		name = moghul.4.b
		add_prestige = 20
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.9
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = moghul.4.a
		change_religion = sunni
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						stability = -2
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ahf
					value = 0
				}
			}
			else = { 
				add_stability = -3
			}
		}
		tooltip = { 
			add_stability = -3
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_emperor_of_china = yes
			}
			add_mandate = -15
		}
		add_legitimacy = -50
		add_prestige = -20
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						has_province_flag = Data
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = acj
					value = -3
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_SpiritualityProv_-3
		hidden_effect = { 
			capital_scope = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = Prov_UI.502
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.1
		}
	}
}
